author: kpedro88
body: HcalCalibrationsSet and HcalCalibrationWidthsSet are derived calibration objects which can contain some non-trivial information: pedestals and pedestal widths converted from adc to fC (using QIE coder), and "respcorrgain" (production of RespCorrs and Gains). This PR adds the ability to dump the relevant non-trivial information from these derived objects to text files, using the existing HCAL database tools.
title: Hcal dump calibrations
